note.p: Career: Sailing Master, Royal Navy; sailed round the world with Vancouver; Master Attendant of H M Dockyard, Woolwich; later was at Plymouth; associated with John Rennie in the enquiry on Plymouth harbour (1805); Resident Engineer to the Plymouth break water (1811)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1832-1833 No 14 pp 229-230
Notes: Appears in PL for 1832 but not after.
